website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon Coolpix P500 improves on its predecessor's features and shooting performance, but its photos and video quality still aren't as good as the rest of the package.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix P500 has a solid design, is overflowing with photo and movie features, and has very fast shooting performance for its class
cons: Its photo and video quality is very soft, particularly at high ISOs and in low-light conditions
It also lacks raw support and auto picture rotation

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOLPIX P500 12.1 CMOS Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful camera for street photography, portrait photography and landscape photography. Although it does not produce RAW files the fine setting for jpegs is great for reasonable size prints. Everything came in the package and the installation disc worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd E. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Aperture, Shutter priorities, manual, program automatic ie ...
customer_reviews.text: Aperture, Shutter priorities, manual, program automatic ie every mode. Zoom doesn't really go to 40 X but is right up there. moveable screen so that camera can be held at waist level or high overhead. For only $99 a steal. A friend has the newer model which she got for $199 which has notable improvements making it easier to use. Found extra batteries and chargers on Amazon for very nominal prices.
customer_reviews.author: Nino Deprophetis

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with rechargeable battery
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a good camera but it says it has rechargeable batteries but ours just came with rayovac batteries. One of the reasons we chose this camera was because it was rechargeable so we are disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: My First Camera
customer_reviews.text: So this is my first “Real” camera and this is such a good beginning camera. I’ve looked online and I’ve seen the reviews and they all come to the same conclusion so not too many settings but just enough to keep you there to tweak as you get more experience this is amazing for the price and how could I forget the zoom it’s so much better than any smartphone zoom and it’s optically zoomed so no degradation in quality
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: point & shoot Digital Camera with professional quality
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon P500 is a small, very efficient digital camera that gives professional results in a small package. It has an amazing 36X OPTICAL zoom that provides excellent clarity and color.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Thickman

customer_reviews.title: Great camera if you aren't ready for a DSLR
customer_reviews.text: I am a very happy owner of this camera! After using the camera since Christmas, I am really getting the hang of the bells and whistles. At my job I use a DSLR camera and that is too fancy and heavy. The thing I really like about the Nikon CoolPix P500 is the fact it is lightweight and shots great shots! I took it to a NHL hockey game and the zoom is incredible, I could see the stitching on the jersey. I am very pleased. I also loved how the night setting photos turn out. We took a photo of our house at night with the Christmas lights on it and it was perfect. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: COOL PICS
customer_reviews.text: I still have'nt mastered all the functions of the Camara but then again, I have not used it that much. Yesterday I took pictures of various sceneries and moving objects. AWESOME!!!!! Several hundred feet away from splashing water on reefs and I managed to get the full zoom to its peak and the pictures that it took were clear. You can definetly see the water drops coming down from the reefs and in the air. Great Item for the price. Although I did find it at one of these mega stores for $20.00 cheaper. HEY, $20 bucks is $20 bucks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Lots to like in this camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm still in my first month with the camera, so the story is not yet complete. The 36x zoom IS incredible, and the "standard" pictures seem to come out very well! I DON'T like the fact that the instruction manual, all 250+ pages, is on a disc, so it is impossible without printing many pages of it to have the instructions with you when you shoot. Soooooo many shooting options, most of which I have yet to "explore". I'll have a better feeling for it in 6-12 months
customer_reviews.author: blasjas26

customer_reviews.title: FUN CAMERA!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have so much fun with this camera i wind up taking hundreds of pix! It goes with me everywhere, and I keep learning more things it's capable of! I'm having such a good time my husband bought one of his own - in red so we could tell them apart! Only one problem - there's no way to mount a lens protector (not a lens cap, which it comes with, but an actual clear protector so the lens doesn't get scratched. Hope Nikon decides to rectify this.
customer_reviews.author: rosanne

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten lots of compliments on the photos I take with this camera, and it's very easy to use. I find that the zoom works better if I put it in manual mode. I wish the camera had better resolution, BUT for the price, ease of use, and good pictures it takes, I can't complain. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to take good pictures with ease. However, I think I'm aiming for an SLR for my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera I have ever owned. I love the pictures and all of the options. The reviews are correct on this one. Update, if you are going to ship your camera out while in the Middle East, do not let them see your camera. Mine never made it back to the states. I loved this camera so much, i took it everywhere in Afghanistan and they took it. Everything else made it back but the camera and bag was removed from my box. Sad day.
customer_reviews.author: BeamMeUpScotty

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera.
customer_reviews.text: I already have owned a Nikon Coolpix P500 now for over 4 years and love it. I decided to by a (used) second one as a back up and it works just as great as my original. I tend to use them in video mode to shoot music videos and my final video edits end up looking like they were made with very expensive equipment. Great outdoor HD video. Good indoor HD video. Not so good video in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: It's Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Favorite most used camera of 4 that I own!
customer_reviews.text: At this surprisingly low price point it has become by most used & favorite camera! This has one of the widest angle lenses (the most used by all photographers), This has one of the best zoom lenses although you need a tri-pod to use 500-700 level zoom, The picture quality is amazingly sharp, crisp and best of all it is easy to use. It does what it says it will do with easy connectivity to computers and printers. I highly recommend this product & seller.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good,  little point and shoot.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult at times to focus in low contrast, manual focus challenging, color a bit low on saturation... but overall I really like it. Love the power zoom and stabilization!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Howell

customer_reviews.title: All around good product and service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Does everything I want. I do a lot of outdoor and aviation photo shoots. Need to be quicker to the draw to get good shots of moving airplanes. I like the one button that switches from view finder to LCD with one press. Service good. Packing good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A Sisul

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price is very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality camera, and I got it for a grade price, I love it man!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a pro at all, so this camera is perfect for me. I just love it, especially the incredible zoom it has. You can do a lot with this P500, I am learning everyday as I'm not so fond of reading manuals, so I browse through it every now and then. But believe me, it is a good camera if you enjoy taking pics and don't necessarily want to invest in a professional camera.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to New Zealand because I didn't want to take my Nikon D80 for weight reasons. The CoolPix took outstanding pictures. The zoom feature is a little touchy -- goes too fast for me most of the time. But overall, it was a great camera to have on a trip. Not too bulky and has lots of functionality. I only tapped into about 20% of its capacity and still got incredible pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOLPIX 500
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long way from a professional but I find the camera quite easy to use without an extended education from the manual. It does all I ask for in a "point and shoot" plus the options of stepping up manual control when desired. If there is one annoyance, it has to the the lens cap that does not push off by when the camera is turned on. I knew this when buying, so it was no surprise. Just have to get used to it unless Nikon comes along with a fix.
customer_reviews.author: Bunt

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is my baby. I love it. I wanted something to catch the moments of my daughter growing but I didnt want a huge crazy one with different lens ect... My child is to active for me to be having to do all that. So this is just perfect. The wide angle lens is awesome! I cant seem to go anywhere without this camera. Moments do not last forever, Unless you have a good camera to capture them!
customer_reviews.author: california

customer_reviews.title: Cool pix P500
customer_reviews.text: I had looked at the camera at one of the local box stores, and found that I couldn't even turn it on. So much for the benefits of getting a hands-on look in person. They had only the demo in stock, and couldn't tell me when they would have more. No such problems with Amazon, it was delivered promptly, and it is everything I had hoped to find.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kintz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, best product in this ranking
customer_reviews.text: The camera works perfect, very easy to manage and all the accesories and software helps to deliver hight quality pictures. I m actually trying with more difficult pictures and the results are good. May be the weak point is taking pictures by nigth but it can be solved with a support and tricks I've learned in this time.
customer_reviews.author: AbnerGzz

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix P500
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, so many features It may take me a year to get used to them all. I do not need a DSLR which is more money and then lenses? This bridge camera has excellent features and really works as advertised. I agree with other reviews that charging the battery in-camera is a pain. I guess a remote charger will fix that. Otherwise I am thrilled with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Bachelder

customer_reviews.title: It has a good charge time
customer_reviews.text: High definition, high resolution, fits in the top compartment of my backpack- I took a picture the other day of my friend coming out of the water with another persons flash from another camera, and you can see the flash of light and water droplets coming off of them from standing roughly 15'-20' away. It has a good charge time, and it's never been a hassle to use.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I think I might got defective camera or it is lousy one
customer_reviews.text: when zooming , the camera very shaking, impossible to hold it steady, I show it to a photography expert, he said it is terrible, impossible to get great picture, shake and shake, so hard to focus!!! The reason I bought it for the 36X zoom. Instead of constant changing lenses w/ my SLR Rebel.
customer_reviews.author: sioe888

customer_reviews.title: Great amateur camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera to be used for amateurs. When it set on the correct setting, you can get same amazing pictures and great memories. One of my friends liked it so much that he bought the very same and he's enjoying it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Dauphin

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix P500 Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing camera for the price. It was exactly as described and works very well. I highly recommend this camera for the amateur photographer. I also advise buying the book Photographer's Guide To The Nikon Coolpix P500 by Alexander S. White.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: I'm Happy..
customer_reviews.text: This Nikon CoolPix P500 was fabulous for me, an amateur photographer, has helped me to understand quite a few things about a camera... I'm Happy.... picture quality is superb once I let the AF settle... Nikon is Number #1 for me...:)
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for the money. I like it because it has the old fashioned view finder, too. Sometimes in bright sunlight it is difficult to see with large view. It is easy to use, takes great pictures, what more could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's ok, now they have this camera without a viewfinder which is one of the reasons I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Gale W Tenney

customer_reviews.title: I Like this Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera and all its parts were delivered on time and undamaged. Packing was outstanding. I have made 412 shots since breaking it out of the box and every one of them was exactly what I photographed. I have played most with the Panorama (easy) and really like that feature. If I had one request of the engineers it would be "Please allow me to turn on the camera with the lens cap on." The suggested camera case is too small if you want to carry batteries, the charger and its auto plugin cord. Just buy a slightly larger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two of these cameras, and I loved them both. I had to replace the first one because of a drop onto concrete. The camera still worked but was severely marked up. This camera has the features of the more expensive cameras with out the high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love how it captures my daughters, the auto focus and image stabilizer gives me crystal clear pictures
customer_reviews.author: Darshane

customer_reviews.title: Wallace experience ever
customer_reviews.text: The reason why I'm not happy because the truck driver met my camera all crash the screen is broken and I am very pissed off
customer_reviews.author: Emil

customer_reviews.title: USED
customer_reviews.text: This digital camera, advertised as NEW, ordered by me a week ago (March 2013) arrived to me with photos already on it of a family opening their Christmas presents dated 2011. It is USED! I'm disgusted by such unethical business practices. Let's see how the company treats me as I try to seek a NEW camera or reimbursement of this USED purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not for picture lovers.
customer_reviews.text: Good images and video features, but response/shutter a bit slow. Not quite a DSLR quality like the D50 or D70. I love taking pictures and the Nikon D5100 is a whole lot better though a lot more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my sister and she loves it, she loves how it is not bulky and can be used anywhere! Takes great photos!
customer_reviews.author: Niterythm

customer_reviews.title: Camera Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this camera in only a few days! Other than arriving without a product box or instruction manual it is exactly what I expected. The camera works exactly as intended and is in great condition. It was shipped in a box FULL of large bubble wrap lol! I could have dropped kicked the box and the camera would never have moved!
customer_reviews.author: Marri

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, as always for a Nikon
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional photographer but this camera is awesome, great zoom, 1080p, great photos, recommend for anyone that want to take great photos but don't have nor the money nor the knowledge to buy and have a manual camera
customer_reviews.author: Josue Farrugia

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for the Holidays at a great price and with free overnight shipping. I love it! What I like the most is how lightweight and compact it is considering the features it has, and that it is easy to use. The "quick set-up" instructions that come in the box are adequate, but for comprehensive instructions one must register at the Nikon website to download a detailed manual. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeQueen

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera, Excellent lens and Zoom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for under $300. It is very well built, has excellent picture and video. The camera has many high end features. Zoom is awesome. Great camera for taking family pictures. Happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Girlgirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because I use one exactly like it at work! It has many of the features you'd expect from a DSLR, without the hassel of weight and multiple lenses. I am very happy that I bought this camera (twice).
customer_reviews.author: MadDog409

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I dont have a whole lot to add, I think most of it has already been said. I love the zoom, although it can get a little hard to focus without a tripod. Overall, it's a great addition to the other cameras I have.
customer_reviews.author: KaMBaM

customer_reviews.title: Purchaser
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a gift. Recipient is very happy with the product. I am happy with timely delivery. Now I want to order one for myself. Thanks again. Debbie
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera with a terrific zoom lens. Only downside is that the fold-out screen doesn't fold sideways. Other than that, great camera and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Ocallaghan

customer_reviews.title: great lens, slightly slow shutter on auto
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera which takes as good or better pictures in most circumstances than my Nikon digital SLR. White balance is fabulous. It does well in low light, too. Big sensor so plenty of resolution. Lightweight makes it a perfect travel camera. Fits easily in a travel bag or small backpack. So there must be a catch, right? Well it doesn't deal well with sudden movement in the auto mode. But then again, what camera does. I am working on learning it still and think I will be able to conquer its flaws.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Rake

customer_reviews.title: A Great bargin.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I reviewed several camera's before I chose this camera. It was what I was looking for in a camera. It is easy to operate for a beginner yet it has the quality of a high-end camera. The zoom is handy in getting pictures of birds, animals, and people that you are unable to get with a point and shoot camera. The photo's I have taken are crisp and high quality. I am happy with my purchase and the price was what I wanted to spend.
customer_reviews.author: Bluefox

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought for the 36 X zoom. You need a very steady hand otherwise the pictures come out blurry. Other than that, it's the same as every other point and shoot camera..
customer_reviews.author: T. Dziedzic

customer_reviews.title: VERY Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I was in need for a new Digital Camera due to a car accident ruining my last one. I am a photography student and starting to take family pictures for family and friends. I needed a great camera that I can depend on. After searching for a month or so I came across the Nikon P500 and was instantly attracted to it. I LOVE the moveable lens. I would recommend this camera to anyone. I absolutely LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: EL PRODUCTO LLEGO OK, TAL Y COMO LO OFRECIERON ESTOY TOTALMENTE SATISFECHO CON EL MISMO. RECOMIENDO AL VENDEDOR ES BASTANTE RESPONSABLE
customer_reviews.author: David Heli Parrado Clavijo

customer_reviews.title: Its okay/.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are blurry sometimes. And the video button is right by a switch that you hit to make things in slow motion with no sound. I accidentally hit the switch and lost my daughters performance in a talent show. Ill never get it back. I have regrets
customer_reviews.author: Elton John

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and and worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional but I do like to takes pictures. This camera has been a great asset. My photos are, for what ever the reason, much, much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient One

customer_reviews.title: If you bought it, you know that have to study
customer_reviews.text: When you buy this kind of camera you know that at least you must to read the manual. It has a point and shoot mode but it doesn't has a magic mode. Don't complain, only have to learn and enjoy it. I recommend it. Excelent camera.
customer_reviews.author: Martin A.

customer_reviews.title: excelente
customer_reviews.text: very good product I liked a lot the take this into account for future purchases and recommendations to friends and acquaintances
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: After 4 years I love my camera I've taken thousand of pictures and video
customer_reviews.text: After 4 years I love my camera I've taken thousand of pictures and video. dropped it a year ago and flash doesn't work anymore but still takes great picture. hoping to graduate to Nikon DSLR Soon
customer_reviews.author: Amp

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift to a friend. She is very satisfied with this camera. It's got a lot of features, easy to use, and takes her photos to a higher level.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Aguiar

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for a friend of mine and I'd love to have a Coolpix for myself so I believe it's a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Padilla Rojas Nilber Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: I received camera on time. Picture quality is good. Features of P500 I liked, especially clarity and zoom. But packing was too bad. I order same camera before, I got Nikon coolpix box. But this time I got in some box. which is not Nikon brand. Camera cap leash is missing . Apart from these camera is too good.
customer_reviews.author: Prady

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate Purchase, but Good Seller
customer_reviews.text: The used Nikon camera that I purchased was not working properly when I received it, so I returned it. The seller shipped very fast and had outstanding customer service, as they were sincere and communicated very well with me, the buyer. I will most likely just purchase a new camera later. I was probably just unlucky with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: I am not too pleased with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I am not too pleased with this camera. It was a mistake to get such a large zoom on a camera because it is impossible to take a good photo when holding the camera free hand with the zoom extended.
customer_reviews.author: James Evers

customer_reviews.title: It is really a great camera
customer_reviews.text: The zoom is fantastic, easy to use all features, and the quality of pictures is awesome but battery life could be better. I am in Galapagos Islands right now and I made pictures from long distance to birds and animals, also I took pictures to nearby targets with the zoom and the focus was really cool. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: edan

customer_reviews.title: ... with the lighting on the camera but not so bad
customer_reviews.text: Problems with the lighting on the camera but not so bad
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: It is a great camera. I have purchased 2 of them. A friend of mine just wanted it so bad that he asked me to buy one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Juanpipi

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I bougth this a little more than one year ago and the flash stop working. I expected more from a nikon. I do not recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Novak

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOPPIX P5000
customer_reviews.text: This is simply an outstanding value with high level features at the best price around --- cannot recommend it highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Potter

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: after carefully comparing others in this class there was too many options to pass on. would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: conley carlton

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix P500 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera worked fine out of the box, I have taken a lot of photos and am more than pleased with the results, which I expect will get better as I gain experience with the P500....fun to use, I recommend it....
customer_reviews.author: LT Colon

customer_reviews.title: Happy with amazon and the products that it caries. Continue with the excellent site and service.
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it needs to do. I'm very happy with service,product, and how easy to use and install.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, service and price, I have successful with my buy, this camera is faster and have full resolution picture, your zoom 36x allows to capture images and videos of excellent quality and makes shots that are difficult to perform with short zoom cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: amazing condition! Every got a cute little free pen
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping , amazing condition ! Every got a cute little free pen! Love love love .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars! The perfect camera for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the picture quality and the many features of this camera. Nikon has a winner in this price range and Amazon got it to me quickly. If you take a lot of pictures, a 2nd battery is a must. However, that is a small price to pay for the smaller footprint and lighter weight that would be lost with a larger capacity battery. The long zoom is fun to use and the quality of the picture is often unbeleavable without a tripod. The panorama mode works great and again the pictures are gorgous.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Good definition, great zoom, excellet movies. Sometimes hard to focus with zoom. Multi-shot is missed! Back light scene option is also missing.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Nikon P500
customer_reviews.text: The long zoom (36x) is great. A tripod or monopod is almost a necessity at this extreme range. The image stabilization is a great help that actually works. I recently used it in a football stadium with a monopod and got some sharp photos at night. The movie function produces a good HD picture but the sound is lacking, especially if there is background noise. This is a good camera with lots of extras, but the zoom was the main attraction for me. I would buy it again. As always, Amazon delivers the goods at a great price. Victor
customer_reviews.author: Victor Roy

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday present for my wife and she is never without the camera. She simply loves it and what she can do with this camera. She said it was the best present she ever received.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera only for $355
customer_reviews.text: I had a coolpix p100 that was an excellent camera that could take more than 5000 photos, and now I decided change by this P500 my first impressions of this camera is that the change was very good, because it has small changes that will improve all the good that already had the P100
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked a lot! It's a very good camera for it's price.. It has a very good price/value relation.. It's amazing how confortable it's the anatomic grip! And the zoom it's awesome! 100% recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Saul Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Nikon p500
customer_reviews.text: This camera is wonderful! It has worked perfectly since day one. I have had the camera for over a year now and have not had any problems with it at all. The zoom is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Briley

customer_reviews.title: a good aniversary gift
customer_reviews.text: Quality and price in a just balance. Superb zoom and very light. My wife new camera. She's in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Antonio FC Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever had
customer_reviews.text: i bought it for the Machu Picchu trip, best pictures ever had, the colors and textures, really worth it, recomended
customer_reviews.author: J. Bello

customer_reviews.title: Nikon camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! The 36x zoom is great.I'm a novice but found it easy to use. I did buy the battery charger and an extra battery so I never run out of power!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I've ever had. we have been able to take the most amazing pictures with it. Thank you Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my wife and she loves it! Takes great pics of my 13 month old daughter! Would reccomend this camera for any one who doesnt have the extra money for a DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: v-REN

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CAMARA EVER ..WITH GREAT GREAT ZOOM RANGE
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for camera with good pic..quality also not so expensive. i really don't wanted to buy DSLR wich is great product also expensive. i research for some coolpix camera . nerow down to the p500 and i am really happy with this buy . i am enjoying this camera alot . in my point of view nobody will disappoint with this great product. in this price range this is very nice deal ever .
customer_reviews.author: kenxtoday

customer_reviews.title: amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! Better then i imagined it would be. Performs like a much more expensive camera and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Zoom!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands been wanting a nice camera with a great zoom. This is delinately it! My husband was so excited. He loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Baltins

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix P500
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the camera for a couple of months, and am pleased with it. I purchased a couple of extra batteries, but have found that one would have got me by a day of shooting. If I was using the flash, this obviously wouldn't be the case. The functions are easy to set and use.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Faulk

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOLPIX P500
customer_reviews.text: The seller of this camera after reviewing my review informed me they were unaware that this camera had a software problem. They offered to take the camera back and refund my purchase amount or exchange the camera with updated software to resolve the problem. This I consider fair and appropriate for the discrepancy. The fault lies with Nikon for releasing a defective product. Why is it that the consumer assumes all the liability when the manufacture is at fault. I would reccomend those who are purchasing anything electronic to search for reviews of the product prior to purchasing. This is not a 100% guarrantee that you won't be stiffed.
customer_reviews.author: flycatch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am not a camera crazy person, so this will be short. I was looking for the best out there, but not an SLR. I don't need lots of lenses and bulk, but I love a great zoom. I am very happy with this camera and would recommend it to anyone. It isn't perfect, but 99% of the issues everyone else (who knows what they are talking about) point out are things I will never need to worry about. I consider this camera an Awesome Point-and-shoot Plus. If you want more, get an SLR. If you want the best Point-and-shoot on the market, get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Deltadiver05

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix P500
customer_reviews.text: Camera is great Takes sharp pictures and is light weight It was a gift for my wife and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: B. ELKINS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera fo the wife to take on their trip to the Rose Parade. It worked great and the pictures turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Compact design and small size gives you ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Compact design and small size gives you a chance to take it with you wherever you go. Good picture quality. Easy to handle. Nice product for non professional photographers like me.
customer_reviews.author: Zivojin Jonjev

customer_reviews.title: Nice point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: This camera does everything it is supposed to and has good image quality and video to match. I found the menues very easy to navigate and have been inspired to do more with the settings other than full auto. Great price for a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: S. Norton

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: i love my new camera, it is just the best one i could imagine :) it takes awesome pictures and this price is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: JohixD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had the P100 for about six months then the P500 was released to the market, so I really wanted to upgrade my camera so I bought it, but you know what the focus system really sucks, that is not what I expected from Nikon. It is hard to take an acceptable picture. I'm totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arce Araya

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I got the camera for my birthday. My dad recommended it, he works in technology and knows his way around electronics so the fact that he bought it for me already says a lot about it. The wide angle allowed me to take a picture of the White House and it's garden without cutting anything off! The panorama option was great for taking the whole Niagara Falls! And the zoom is sooo good! I took a very crisp and clear photograph of the moon. The camera is very versatile and I love it! You won't regret buying it
customer_reviews.author: ariesara93

customer_reviews.title: Nikon P500
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. I liked it. I will recommend this to my friends.. Easy to use. Low light photos are ok..
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is what I wanted and at a very reasonable price. The camera was delivered quickly, was packed well and came out of the box in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Ann H. Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Very good all-around camera.
customer_reviews.text: This camera has very good picture quality. I don't know much about camera's, but we had a Nikon P80 and liked it a lot! It was stolen so I decided to get this one. I think if I were to get into photography more I would go for an SLR. The video quality is very good as well. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money for 36x
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Nikon and I always want to get as close as I can get to birds, ducks, geese, and even far off mountains. However, I don't think this camera is worth the price for the 36x shot. Nikon's camera at 24 or 26 does just as good a job. With 36 you really need a tripod for that zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B. McDonell, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: The instruction book says there is "Manual Focus" capability, but the camera doesn't have it! Did I get a lesser product at full price? I enquired, but surprise, surprise, got no response from Amazon. Immediate weasel-out was to blame the supplier. Amazon washes their hands awfully quickly, it seems. It is highly unlikely that I will buy from Amazon again, and will certainly spread the word that buying from a local store is far preferable to long-distance, no-recourse, hard-to-communicate, impossible-to-get-an-answer purchasing from some entity like Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: valves

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX P500 12.1 CMOS Digital Camera with 36x NIKKOR Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER


ZOOMING ABOVE AND BEYOND.
PUT YOURSELF IN THE CENTER OF THE ACTION.
You've never been closer to the action than you are with this 36x wide-angle optical Zoom-NIKKOR® ED glass lens. Its optical zoom (22.5–810mm) pulls you in from wide panoramas to crisp close ups. Plus, a side zoom control marks the end of shaky zooms—freeing you to capture great action photos with minimal blur. So whether you're shooting a mountain vista or zooming in on a snowboarder, say goodbye to missed shots. This lens catches it all. It even allows for macro shooting as close as 0.4 inches!



Wide panoramas to crisp close-ups. STUNNING PHOTOS IN NOT SO STUNNING SHOOTING CONDITIONS.
Whether you're aiming at a midnight skyline or zooming in on a hang-glider in a sun drenched sky, Nikon enables you to take incredible photographs and movies. With its 12.1-megapixel backside-illuminated CMOS sensor, dual image processors and Nikon's EXPEED C2 image processing engine, it frees you to shoot highly detailed images with minimal noise and distortion.

The COOLPIX P500 is ideal for shooting high speed action, so you're sure to capture the fastest skateboarders, skiers and windsurfers. It's armed with ISO speeds up to 3200 and equipped with a five-way Vibration Reduction (VR) Image Stabilization System that reduces the streaky images associated with shaky cameras. The COOLPIX P500 even has a motion detector that identifies moving subjects and then adjusts the camera's settings to ensure that you won't miss a frame of the action.

WHATEVER YOU WANT TO SHOOT, THE COOLPIX P500 IS READY.
You'll never miss a shot with this versatile camera because it starts right up, has a quick autofocus, and shoots five shots in approximately one second—at full resolution. Plus, multiple Continuous Modes allow for a variety of high speed shooting options up to a blazing 120 frames per second*.

Up to five consecutive images per second. When a single picture just isn't enough, the versatile COOLPIX P500 features a One-Touch record button that lets you shoot Full HD (1080p) movies at 30fps while recording audio with a built-in stereo microphone. It's great for sporting events because it will record high speed activity in slow motion, catching action missed by the human eye. The COOLPIX P500 also has an HDMI-CEC output for simple playback on your HDTV or computer—so now it's as easy to watch your own movies as it is to shoot them.

*reduced resolution

ANY ANGLE. ANY LIGHTING. ANY SHOT.
The COOLPIX P500 is all you need to shoot eye-catching photographs, thanks to the three-inch, tilting, vari-angle monitor. This 921,000-dot display not only makes it easy to capture, review, and share images, but it also enables you to shoot from unusual angles and tricky vantage points. The Clear Color Display has a brightness adjustment and an anti-glare coating, so it remains vivid in the most challenging lighting conditions. And for those who want even more compositional freedom, the versatile COOLPIX P500 comes with an eye-level electronic viewfinder.



PANORAMAS: SEAMLESS, EFFORTLESS, GENIUS.
Mountains. Canyons. Sunsets. The glory of these vistas is the breadth and grandeur of their natural beauty. That's why the COOLPIX P500 includes Easy Panorama Mode that combines multiple shots into a seamless 180- or 360-degree panoramic picture. Simply move the camera as you shoot and let the COOLPIX P500 combine the shots for you. Choose from 19 different Scene Modes or let the camera automatically select the most appropriate settings. Either way, you'll have a panoramic shot that captures the size, scope and splendor of the most majestic scenes imaginable.

THE COOLPIX P500 PUTS YOU IN CONTROL.
Whether you're shooting a scenic overlook or a competitive speedboat race, the COOLPIX P500 captures images the way you want them. It lets you select aperture and shutter priorities, and includes a Manual Exposure Mode that puts you in complete control. And shooting at night is a breeze with the Advanced Night Landscape and Advanced Night Portrait Modes. Simply press the shutter release and the COOLPIX P500 will shoot multiple shots and automatically combine them into a single, superior image.

WHATEVER YOU'RE SHOOTING, IT COULDN'T BE EASIER THAN WITH THE COOLPIX P500.
The COOLPIX P500 is master of convenience—and the ideal choice for capturing fast action, low-light images, panoramas and stunning portraits. And its Smart Portrait System includes a Blink Warning that warns you when your subject may have blinked. It also includes in-camera Red-Eye™ technology that automatically fixes red-eye, a Face-Priority feature that can focus up to 12 faces and a Skin Softening feature that smoothes out skin tones at three different levels. This versatile camera even allows for macro shooting as close as 0.4 inches. Plus, it comes with a rechargeable Li-ion battery that lasts for approximately 220 pictures.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * COOLPIX P500 Digital Camera
 * LC-CP23 Lens Cap
 * AN-CP21 Strap
 * UC-E6 USB Cable
 * EG-CP16 Audio/Video Cable
 * EN-EL5 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery
 * EH-69P AC Adapter/Charger
 * Nikon View NX 2 CD-Rom
feature_bullets: 36x Wide Angle Optical Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass Lens
12.1megapixel CMOS sensor for high-speed operation and exceptional low light performance
Capture 5 shots in one second at full resolution
Full HD (1080p) Movie with Stereo sound and HDMI Output

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars240 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
